title: Wisconsin women's hockey defeats St. Thomas 7-0 | Video | wkow.com
text: Wisconsin women's hockey defeats St. Thomas 7-0 Weather Alert ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch along with blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibilities are also expected. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills to as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Iowa, Dane, Lafayette, Green and Rock Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 AM CST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. && ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow.
